News.Title: Shivalic Power Control Limited Secures 6.8 Million Rupee Order for LT Panels
News.Summary: Shivalic Power Control Limited has been awarded a significant order for LT (Low Tension) panels worth 6.8 million rupees. This development is considered prestigious for the company, which currently has a market capitalization of 545 crore rupees.

News.Title: Shivalic Power Control Secures 41 Million Rupee Order for LT Panels
News.Summary: Shivalic Power Control has been awarded an order worth 41 million rupees for LT (Low Tension) panels. This order represents a significant business opportunity for the company in the power control equipment sector.

News.Title: Shivalic Power Control Secures 41 Million Rupee Order for LT Panels
News.Summary: Shivalic Power Control has been awarded an order worth 41 million rupees for Low Tension (LT) panels. This order represents a significant business opportunity for the company in the power control equipment sector.

News.Title: Shivalic Power Control Reports 72% Revenue Growth in H1 FY25
News.Summary: Shivalic Power Control has announced a significant revenue increase for the first half of fiscal year 2025. The company recorded revenue of Rs 535 million, representing a year-over-year growth of 72%.
